segments.text: Welcome ! Sophia told us you were coming !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Um ... It's wonderful to be here . Uh ... this place looks really cozy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you ! Your cheeks are as red as a tomato ! Are you shy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Some of my grappa will cure your shyness .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is that a kind of alcohol ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's a clear spirit we drink any time of the day . You will love it !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great . My face will turn even redder !
segments.speaker: S2
